JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are looking for Java/ J2EE developers with at least 1 Year experience in software development.  Freshers who have undergone an exhaustive training program in Java/ J2EE can also apply. 

Experience in Spring or Struts 2
Experience in Hibernate or JPA
Strong knowledge in any database (MySQL preferred)
Knowledge and experience with advanced JavaScript,  jQuery and AJAX
Excellent written and verbal communication skill
Ability to quickly adapt and learn new technologies
Able to work efficiently with minimal supervision
Degree in Computer Science /  related field preferred
